text: Echo Show 8 displays 'offline' in Alexa app but device responds to voice commands. Firmware version 1.2.3, app version 2.5.6.
That's app-device desync. Device is online but app can't detect. Forget device in app, reboot Echo Show, re-discover in app settings.
Prime Video buffers every 30 seconds on Fire TV Stick 4K. Internet speed test shows 150 Mbps download, router 5 feet away.
Authentication error means credential sync problem. Log out completely, clear app cache and cookies, reboot device, then re-login.
Shopping app won't load product images on iOS 17 iPhone 14. Blank squares everywhere. Cellular data and WiFi both tested.
Image loading failure on iOS 17 suggests CDN issue. Try changing DNS to 8.8.8.8, disable any VPN, force quit app, reinstall.
Amazon Music app throws 'authentication failed' error on Android 13 device. WiFi connected, browser works fine, just app fails.
Buffering with high bandwidth indicates app cache issue. Clear Prime Video cache, change streaming quality to 1080p, reboot Fire Stick.
Echo Show 8 displays 'offline' in Alexa app but device responds to voice commands. Firmware version 1.2.3, app version 2.5.6.
That's app-device desync. Device is online but app can't detect. Forget device in app, reboot Echo Show, re-discover in app settings.
